description: Officers were on their way to investigate a report of a nude jogger when the man was hit by a car.
title: Naked Man Doing Push-Ups Struck and Killed by Car in Portland
title_page: Naked Man Doing Push-Ups Struck and Killed by Car in Portland
text:
Breaking News Emails Get breaking news alerts and special reports. The news and stories that matter, delivered weekday mornings.
A naked man doing push-ups in the road was struck and killed by a car in Portland, Oregon, on Sunday.
Police said officers were responding to a report of a man running in buff about 4 a.m. when a second call came in that he was also doing calisthenics.
Before police arrived on the scene, a third call came in reporting that the man had been hit by a vehicle. He was already dead when officers got there.
The driver stayed at the scene and was not impaired by alcohol or drugs, investigators said. The victim has not been identified.
â€” Tracy Connor
